description:
Game: Pontifex 2 - Bridge Builder
Platform: PC

Game Name: Pontifex 2 
Type: Simulation  
Publisher: Chronic Logic 
Website: http://www.chroniclogic.com
 <a href=" http://www.bridgebuilder-game.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.bridgebuilder-game.com/</a>


aka Bridge Builder!


Pontifex is Bridge Builder as it was meant to be - the inventive game concept of building bridges is taken to a new level. Here are some of the new features (adapted from the official page):

- 3D Graphics and Physics Engines
View your bridges from any angle, or use the train view for a 1st-person experience

- Simple and Complex Editing Modes
Simple mode is just as easy to edit as Bridge Builder, while complex mode allows you to edit in 3D

- New Materials
Different strength and weight steel and cables allow you to build many types of bridges, including suspension bridges

- Adjustable difficulty level
Three difficulty settings ensure a challenging game for both beginners and veterans

- Level Editor
The built-in editor lets aspiring designers expand upon the original game by creating their own levels

- More levels
The game currently includes a total of 48 original levels, plus the 10 levels from the demo. If that&#039;s not enough, check out the levels made by fans or try making your own!

The 3D engine offers great new possibilities - build any kind of structure you can imagine, even though it&#039;s actually just a bridge building game. If you liked Bridge Builder, Pontifex will just blow you away.

Hardware requirements:

Windows 98/ME/2000/XP
AMD or Intel 300 Mhz processor or better
Nvidia TNT2 or Voodoo3 class of graphics card or better
32MB of free memory


(Description taken from www.bridgebuilder-game.com)
